law.history: Repealed 1996 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 83, effective December 12, 1996. -- Amended 1987 (1st. Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 18, effective January 4, 1988. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 25. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4907.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Lump-sum compensation -- When and how made.
